article.title: U.S. Air Force Procures Counter-IED Robotic System
article.text: RoboTeam, Gaithersburg, Maryland, has been awarded a $25 million firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for an explosive ordnance disposal small robot. Contractor will deliver a robot system with logistics and maintenance support. Work will be performed worldwide as necessary and is expected to be complete by September 16, 2022.Â This award is the result of a competitive acquisition with three offers received. Fiscal 2015 operations and maintenance funds in the amount of $4,800,000 are being obligated at the time of award. The 772nd Enterprise Sourcing Squadron, Tyndall Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity (FA8051-15-D-0009).

imgalttext.img: RoboTeam, which builds the Micro Tactical Ground Robot, has been awarded a $25 million contract by the U.S. Air Force for a small robot system, logistics and maintenance support.
